description: This component defines rules for a Bounty

variables.name: success_xp
variables.comment: Amount of XP earned on successful completion of this Bounty

variables.name: lower_bound
variables.comment: Lower bound of staked amount required for reward

variables.name: upper_bound
variables.comment: Upper bound of staked amount required for reward

variables.name: bounty_time_lock
variables.comment: Amount of time (in seconds) to complete this Bounty + NFTs are locked for

variables.name: group_id
variables.comment: Bounty Group ID defined in the SoT,  ex: "WOOD_BOUNTY"

variables.name: input_loot_set_entity
variables.comment: Bounty Input Loot component namespace GUID defined in the SoT

variables.name: output_loot_set_entity
variables.comment: Output Loot component GUID, unique namespace GUID defined in the SoT
